::Perndabot::

Perndabot looks down at Nue'e as he feels her tug on a finger, 
listening to her words. His eyes travel back to lock onto Biomass's 
face, seeing the expression in his eyes. Perndabot growls. He would 
love to slag this bot, but his Maximal roots were holding him back. 
Despite his Alliance programming, there were still some small 
leftovers from Maximal behavior.

"You are lucky that the femm is here," he says to Biomass, "Or else 
I'd be slagging you right now."

Perndabot makes no move to walk toward the Iron Fist, instead looking 
at Biomass and waiting for his reaction.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> 
> 
> 
> * Biomass smiles to himself; so this bot had an attetude after all. 
Perfect.
> This was a very important discovery, one that he logged away into 
his data 
> banks.
> Nue'e looked edgy as she stood behind Perndabot, giving Biomass the 
look. 
> This could get ugly, and they were here to discover, not beat the 
crap out 
> of them.
> She reached up with a careful hand and moved to give a little tug 
on one of 
> Perndabot's fingers to get his attention.*
> 
> " Um...excuse me?"
> 
> * Her voice was small, like her nature. She was very timmid and 
this was a 
> big step for her.*
> 
> "Don't mind him. He's always trying to show off infront of the 
ladies."
> 
> * Her optics motioned from Perndabot to Swift, even though she was 
lying 
> through her teeth. Biomass was doing this to see the personality of 
> Perndabot so he could have something interesting to report.
> She gives Biomass that look again, telling him to just go along 
with it.
> Biomass doesn't even aknowledge the look.*
> 
> " We'll see him now if he's not busy. Take us to him." he said, 
pushing his 
> luck even further. He glances when he sees a movement in the corner 
of his 
> eye, noticing the autogun move towards them, looking back towards 
Perndabot
> with an expression that said that he had seen the weapon and who it 
was
> aiming at.
> But Biomass also had a single sentance written in his expression as 
well, 
> his optics locked with Perndabots. " Bring it on." And his look 
spoke true.*
>
